review_text: - The reason to purchase fitness band is to get results ......
It gives wrong BP values. I understand their could be some variance. But absolutely wrong values doesn't leave me with a positive feedback.
Excellent product!! Very Good band for a starter!! Coaching tips are amazing the Coach keeps you continuously motivating and keep the status updated about ur Goals!!

The over all experience so far is good with the step counter and pulse rate. The best part is the free subscription and the team behind have the knowledge and help you alot in achieving the Health Goals. Please go for a normal band with subscription as that would a better idea. Goqii is unable to provide the accuracy in BP/Vitals which was the main feature being marketed here. The results of Blood Pressure are highly inaccurate. This certainly needs an improvement over current version of software.

After I received it, it was quite a disappointment. The BP gauge is inaccurate to say the least - off by over 20 on the lower reading. And the other health information that I look for in a Fitness tracker is the Sleep pattern monitoring, which is not provided. The steps counter was accurate and the colour display attractive. But even the mode button selection was not that friendly nor was the instruction guide. I see there are so many 5* & 4* reviews for this product, maybe my expectations are different. So do try it, but make sure if you do not like it, return quickly - I missed that too!
Good product for it price, however i would like to see following limitations removed to score it higher

First day I didn't feel impresssed of this product. When I started connecting with app things changed reverse . I got more excited on the reminders and coach guidance. Motivation is amazing also my coach read my food logs , exercise logs and advice me regularly . Best product I bought so far in my list
It‚Äôs very good buy ,

This is the second band which I exchanged coz the previous one was damaged. Yet again I don't feel it's brand new as I can see a crack mark below the left corner. And the seal was previously broken with cellophane tape wrapped on it. Totally dissatisfied with this product n Amazon

What I love the most about GOQii is the eco system where it‚Äôs the whole community of people who love fitness, quite an engaging and interactive platform. Blood pressure monitor is a great revolution in a fitness band. A big thumbs up to the GOQii team,

Its a good to have gadget for fitness loving people. Gives good information about steps covered, sleep, & heart rate. Can be worked upon a bit for more accurate blood pressure details. It would have been a better deal if extra strap been provided along with the original band.
after usage of 1 month, following are the observed pros & cons of this device
Value for money .great Deal .
The basic purpose of any fitness band is to approximately track your daily activities which most of the mass products easily do. The question comes then, why GOQii?? ...

A goal oriented approach to health management. Along with the product, you'll need a little determination and disciple. I've been losing a kilo a week gor the past 8 weeks. Thanks to small changes to lifestyle, measured at the right intervals, along an encouraging coach. Pretty happy with the results.

Not working properly,Blood pressure results are not adequate,due to this giving tension.So I want to return but return windows is closed within 10 days after delivery instead time one month,this is a cheating with customer.
Good fitness tracker at reasonable price , many features like üíì rate , steps, BP, sleep monitor which are more helpful for daily routine.

Not as expected. I received a damaged non working band. Then I ordered for replacement. After I received the replacement, then I tried to connect to my mobile, it asked for activation code. Even though you don't want the personal coaching and want to use the band still you need to activate the membership. This is cumbersome. Also I didn't like the display. Does not look classy. I returned the replacement order as well. Mi band 3 is better than this and price is also same.

It is an awesome activity tracker. It has made me follow healthy eating habits. The motivation it gives is ultimate. I am able to exercise and walk on a daily. No excuse, no fatigue. Hats off to you GoQii. üòäüôå
Using this product fron 2 months. Product is awesome. Coaching which comes with the product helps you to achieve your goals.

Average quality and accuracy, only reason I think is the coaching plan. But after purchasing it, I came to know that we can link other trackers to Thier app, so this one is not needed. Coaching plan also depends upon coaches, the one I got initially wasn't good, but i realised it after 4 months when I changed coach due to some issue with earlier one,I noticed this new one is a real coach who is really interested in my fitness and goal, so this 4 star is because of that new coach only, otherwise it would have been 2 to 3 max. One thing which I didn't knew earlier and that matteres to me was that you can have verbal communication only after 15 days as per policy, and coaches and experts take it very seriously if you schedule calls earlier like 10 days, even if you miss few calls on schedule.
I have been using the band for about 5-6 months now. Here is an honest review:

An excellent watch for this prize. Stylish watch with bright screen and accurate heart rate measurement. I noticed two issues: one, the watch keeps disconnecting to connect it again, I need to clear Bluetooth catch; two, the blood pressure measurement is not accurate as it only shows low pressure even after the workout. Otherwise one of the best available in the market today!
loved the design and aesthetics. was eagerly awaiting the launch and derived utmost satisfaction once got this new GOQii vital band. Thanks for motivating me towards a healthy lifestyle.

The other details were accurate. But issue I faced was blood pressure. It showed 121/64 and less on other two instance . But measured manually and with other digital device it was not the one as stated by band. Error was more than permissible.
Review After 3 months

Really disappointed with GOQii. I had a great impression on GOQii since im using GOQii v2. With that impression I bought GOQii vital and i am sorry to say that the reading if GOQii vital is really wrong. I didn‚Äôt even wore that watch and it was showing I already walked 60 steps. Next is the Blood Pressure (Bp) its not giving the correct reading. Im telling this because i have manual BP machine. Sad to return it and not going to use GOQii anymore unless they update it

Worst product, it even not deserve 1 star. I am order it to gift. Received watch failed to charge, dispaly was not working. Successful y got replaced  with in 2 days..G8 service and support of Amazon. Replaced watch didn't run 48 he and stop working  ..again tanks to Amazon support and refund policy, which help to get back my hardcore money. Earlier I have bought Mi3, no issue with it. Ba naam baday darshan khotay. Goqii, there is no point to provide karma point, coach and so so if this China made band is not up to the mark.

I have been using this Vital wristband. I use it to measure heart rate and blood pressure along with steps I walked. I take all these measurements literally without examining accuracy. In fact, I don‚Äôt know how accurate this wristband is for above mentioned uses. This wristband is not FDA approved. Period. However, I wear it in day times and enjoy using it. This is just a fitness band and not a medical device. So, measure your Blood Pressure and Heart Rate and keep it for the sake of keeping it. It has no real value! Enjoy your steps.
I purchased this band yesterday. Upon opening it first time there were already 3000 odd steps calculated in it. How is it possible ?
There's a serious trouble with the charging unit. Even the replacement band stopped charging on second charge.

I'm not satisfied with the product. Doesn't give correct reading of steps shows one reading in the app and different in the tracker, time format keeps changing from 12hr to 24hr, Sleep tracking doesn't work properly. Frequent connection issue with Bluetooth connection. Overall very disappointed

Compared to similarly priced Mi band, GoQii band is very poor, inaccurate and counts false steps. Even distance travelled sitting in a vehicle is counted as 'steps', random number of steps get added even of you are sitting in one place and doing nothing , which makes this band hopelessly inaccurate and useless.
The main advantage of Goqii is that it focuses on the main thing that a fitness lifestyle requires. Commitment to a healthier lifestyle and motivation to keep doing it.
Nice Coaching and good band.

Some problem with the Seller Cloudtail...delivered first one with used scratch card...replacement done with a faulty one with battery lasting for 12 hours only...finally GOQII replaced the machine...working good now...approximately 4 days of battery life

GOQI is one of the best bands I have experienced. The best facility is free coaching which is really amazing. Easy sync of step.count, sleep data, heart rate and colour display is fantastic. The step count and sleep data is is accurate. Charging is easy and faster.
Pros:

Blur free colour display. Brightness is good enough for use it in sun light. Step count and heart rate measurements are high accurate. But the best thing is coaching. Expert personal coach is always available, who can give a good diet and training plan which helps to stay fit and track your fitness as well. Goqii health store is awesome, healthy food to fitness accessories are available with good discounted price.
Best fitness band and best coaching experience till now.
I recently purchased this device. I have always heard a lot about GOQII, but honestly I am disappointed. There are few things I'd like to point out -
The display is great, the vitals are helpful and the best part, it tracks our sleep and tells us how our sleep pattern has been.
Great product! Value for money. Vitals are accurately recorded. The app provides a complete fitness ecosystem as compared to other fitness bands

Battery back up is nice. Step counting is not accurate but it is ok. One more thing goqii should improve is automatic BP and heart rate monitoring as it becomes irritating after few days to measure manually. Google fit is also missing. It shoud connect with google fit data  display quality should be inproved. Live video is the best feature which i liked.

Look : Nice. Comfort Wearable. Steps, Heart rate showing proper. Blood Pressure absolute WRONG. Lower always shown around 60-65. How's is it possible!!!!! Customer support said it shall be perfect after firmware update. But, no update and still showing wrong. Further, no response from customer support.
Great product to keep track of fitness with support provided with the app to follow a healthy lifestyle. Worth it if getting fit is your aim.
Received same defective piece twice. The band is nice but if you are giving used and defective (scratch Mark in bottom part) products in the name of sale then it's not ok
The product is something different from the others. The BP monitoring is a good feature
Good product but the battery life is very poor. Otherwise it works as it should as a fitness tracker.

Received a replacement as GOQii watch was NOT linking to the tracker app, however the new one too doesn't link to the tracker app, a horrifying experience #UnprofessionalGOQii. Amazon shud black list such products. The customer care people are mostly non exsistant few available r clueless and cudnt help except suggesting replacement, #UnProfessionalGOQii. Will wait 24h and then proceed to complaint in consumer forum.
Good product with excellent customer care support
The best

True value for money, providing reasonably accurate readings for all parameters. Especially, the sleep pattern is accurately captured. Liked the sleep graph especially. Battery life could be slightly better, but lasts for 5 days. Coaching is a unique concept which I have been benefiting the most. No second thought on renewing my subscription. Happy customer ‚ò∫*
Kindly note no Activation code is given along with the product which is essential to link with the Goqii app. kindly provide with the code as soon as possible. My mob no. 9496166634,
Awesome watch. Love the BP monitor function, Fairly accurate reading. Two star less for the seller. Seems the seal was broken and there was a scratch on the display.
I purchase this product on last week.

I find the tracker extremely useful  as it reminds me at regular intervals to get up and walk and reach the target of 7 km daily.(Which I have set for myself).Besides this I also have the benefit of monitoring my B.P/Heart rate.To top it all I get the advice of fitness experts.I have been using this tracker(Vital) for the past 3months.

It app look like an ad page. Lot of advertisement. They forgot the purpose of the band . Very difficult to moniter the activities. Application lost connection to the band very frequently. Bp monitoring is just waste. Inaccurate and inconsistent. Realy disappointed. Only good thing is it look nice.
Good product
Blood Pressure measurement is in accurate, generally there is slight difference. But there major failure of device. My BP buy manual instrument showed 170: 110 where watch was showing 110: 69......
Received device before 3 days, steps recording is getting reset to zero..There is issue with device..Goqii team should take this concern seriously else their Brand image will get shattered.
Motivating product
very usefull and very accurate result thanks goqii.
There is a lot of deviation when I measure BP using a manual BP apparatus and use this monitor hnec cant rely on the readings of this one even during exercise

The product ordered was for gifting someone. The three month activation card which was along with the fit band was already scratched and hence the code when entered it shows invalid.  I tried contacting GOQII customer service but unable to receive any help. Highly disappointed with my first order.

At this price point, this product is value for money, providing reasonably accurate readings for all parameters. Especially, the sleep pattern is accurately captured. Battery life could be slightly better, but lasts for 3-3.5days. Value buy.
Fake footstep count
One of the best band
Found box seal broken. Activation code is scratched. Device not switch ed on. Pathetic experience.
Wonderful product .....enjoying battery life. However no one contacted for coaching......still waiting

Band is not working and this look used one ..I have gifted to my son on Diwali ..so we opened the packet on 8th nov and tried to charge the band but it is not charging and there is lot of scratches on band ..my humble request is to change the product ..pls revert
Though company claims 7 days battery life but in fact it hardly lasts up to less than 2 days. It doesn't sync automatically and needs manual sync every time.
I like this product very much...
nice plastic but small in size !! The Blood pressure assessed is totally incorrect !!
I have been addicted to my fitness.Nice product. Worth the price paid. The beauty is assignment of a Coach. My coach is an excellent motivator and provides feedback regularly.
I ordered this product in november. By the end of the month it has already stopped working. The device doesnt charge anymore. IS it possible to replace/return it?

This is the worst product ever purchased from Amazon  .has serious ussues in connecting with phone..steps counts are false..wanted to return the product but could not do in hhe absence of tags ..hsve ordered mi 3 now..waste of money

The product has stop to work in 1 month. This is useless product.  The service center is only available in Mumbai and it is not providing good services.  Every time you have to send the product with own your money.  Please carefully before to purchase.
Blood pressure measurement is faulty
I do not find call,wa, message notification features in it. It also has sync problem even than it is connected to fone via Bluetooth. Should I return it.
Calories burned were not shown n watch is not charging, used it for 3 days then when put it to charge it was not charging. Tried both from laptop n adapter, plz help
Good product in 2k.
Not up to mark, blood pressure 8s not at all accurate
Working good.. step count accurate +\-10.. heart rate ok but bp monitor is not accurate...
Not satisfied poor screen-try honor 4 instead.
Activation code is  invlad and I think is were used by amazon

Despite reading poor reviews I went for it only bcoz I my experience with their other lower generation band was decent. Sleep tracking is inconsistent and terrible. They need to fix this in this model.
Watch is not fully functional it has some defects , like cannot able to set time ,
Frequently disconnected from Goqii tracker need to work on it
goqii vital band battery life of 7 days on product description but battery full discharge in 24 hours. Other features are ok.
I used many bands, but this Goqii is awesome. Coach follow up also exellant. Please please try guys.
BP monitor shows purely inaccurate data. For every person  it shows around 120/80. Even for people with hypertension.
Bluetooth connection not good. Everytime need to off and on again Bluetooth. Device should automatically connect back to paired device but it not get connected back.
It frequently hangs and does not respond. The measurements are absurd.
Worst product ever just don't buy it battery doesn't last for 24 hours
Awesome experience with fitness band and good to learn from personal coach.
Battery doesn't last for more than 2 days even with minimal use.
The product needs to priced on the lower side.
Not correct reading even for steps, coaches are timepass. However any band will motivate you for better exercise, try other bands.
Good product.
I'm totally disappointed with the quality check of Amazon..I got a completely dead item..it's neither switching on nor it is getting charged with the usb..
Product is good in quality and the best part is high class coaching provided by the Goqii
The battery is weak not as good as mentioned lasts only for 2 days max and the band accuracy is not up to the mark and it frequently disconnects from the app.
Amazing product, Helps You to stay Fit, Eat Healthy& achieve Your target Goals!
Worst product
Good product,  blood pressure monitor not sure actual,battery life is poor battery life improves then best prroduct
Good one
Blood pressure not accurate. Not value for money... Pls don't buy
Not up to the mark
very good product but dont know how to use so returned
i buy this product but problem in charge not doing just work 2-3 days one time i replace this product again facing charging problem
Stopped working right after second day of use,  fake product. Returned to Amazon as I got.
Gouqi tracker is working as expected since buying 4 months ago.
Good quality but not accurate steps at all.
Great Product...
Poor Quality, this product didn't get charged after 10 days. Unable to use. Missed the return date as it is 10 days since delivered

I had bought original GOqii around two year back and it stopped working since it fell in water. Since then was thinking of buying a new one.  Got surprised to see upgraded version of the band and bought it on prime day.  To my surprise band is water proof and has several functions including heart rate, blood pressure, bluetooth notifications etc.,  Further got 3 month health coach subscription.  The band is working well since then.
BP device accuracy did not meet my expectations.Error was more than 10 %.
Goqii app is amazing. Specially the coach gives correct guidance and direction. All questions/doubts are resolved.
Battery is of very worst quality
Excellent device with coaching support.
Great product, easy to set up and use. It displays BP recording but seems random.
Nice productüëç
BP monitor is not working & little bit scratch came in box piece itself feel bad about this product.....
Horrible. This product died after a month's usage. I cant even turn it on. Absolute wastage of money.
this product and his app. co-oprete every minute me and live coches  all solution my problem

It is not getting on. No screen display . Even after 1 hour recharge. It is a totally wastage of money.

I like the design efficiency, but still the company has to improve customer care support when ever they say they'll mail regarding the complaint they don't send mails!. Am using the new vital band the step count is counted even driving or travelling in bus since I travel four hours a day nearly 5000 to 6000 steps is getting counted daily which is very bad!!! Regarding the app also it is still not clear. Not friendly, only i can see they are promoting many food items.which i don't need!!!

This has been a most disappointing experience. The first piece I got did not switch on. The replacement device was charged and worn for a few days. Once the battery ran out - it was plugged into my laptop USB to charge - it simply does not work. It doesn't charge. it doesn't come on either.  When it was in use - the only feature i found useful was the pedometer - which can be substituted by any mobile app ! The BP readings were far too low and are no where even remotely close to my actual BP levels. This purchase has been a big mistake.

Good product with a week's battery life. First time it went on for 2 days but from next charge onwards giving almost a week's worth . Coach are great and keep track of your performance and give suggestions as well to improve your health and fitness

When I searched for perfect Fitness activity tracker through online research and with reviews, I found GOQii came up with L1 both in Price and Technical. But immediately after purchase what was impressed me a lot is their Coaching facility to encourage you to get FIT with proper guidance and Doctor on call which will make you definitely to get fit with some target. I appreciate the whole GOQii team for their initiative to make India better with Fitness... Go for it guys instead of paying to Hospitals...

It's a Fantastic device or rather best word would be program, This device is not a time keeper its a health monitor, sorry not health monitor but health maker. initially i just thought some smart watch but my perception changed quickly with regular health monitoring by nutritionist on my water, food, sleep, healthy diet intake. expert doctors query solving, health videos, experienced user who had changed their sedentary lifestyle to healthy and Fit lifestyle.  live with their experience. its been am awesome experience truly, Thanks Goqii its just not a device but health in total which we  definitely miss in our day to day life. i would also add to people who have joined gym, for them its a parameter to healthy way monitoring  without injury, yoga and other training, mind blowing stuff.  Its a serious product one should have,

Have been a Goqii "Player" off and on literally since the beginning. This is by far the best band to come out of their stables ! The colour screen is a welcome addition and the swiping just makes it a lot easier to use. Heart rate and step counts are bang on , probable more accurate than previous versions .
Got the product delivered yesterday
Nice band for the price range.

It‚Äôs only been a day and my mom is loving this GOQii vital band. she keep checking the blood pressure, heart rate and steps and went for a walk at night to compete her 7000 steps. The health coach feature is very nice and motivating.
very god performance. Meet the expectation.I am in my goal to fit for healthy life.
Loving this band have been using it for a month now. Measure footsteps, heart rate and Blood pressure
Loved it. The OLED display looks really great. This combined with the Goqii ecosystem is a great user experience.
Nice Fit band for this price range,
This is my second GoQii band.

What I liked the most about this GOQii band which I purchased after a lot of research is the ecosystem that it provides. The hardware is pretty good and it's easy to charge since we needn't carry an extra cable, but the head itself can be directly plugged into any USB port. The next thing I liked about GOQii vital is that it can be worn even during swimming.

Good band with color display. Little difficult to connect with app. Charging is very tecnical and with lead to breakage of watch overtime or loosening of strap as have to pull out the strap to connect with USB charger. Been 2 days using it. Gets auto disconnected. Feels little girlish. Lots of things to do in app. Gets personal coaching and diet chart.
Awesome. Good coach assistance keeps you on your set targets. Tracking of your activities keep you pushing. A must have for wanting to be fit

I have been on the GOQii platform since it started 3.5 years ago. From V1 to V2 and now I have upgraded to GOQii Vital.  I got my GOQii Vital on Amazon prime Day at a great introductory price. And I am so happy with the new tracker. I have not done many reviews on GOQii but Vital I thought merits a review. It's sleek as compared the other two bands that I have had. It's easy to use as well.  Even if the user manual is not there it is easy to use and self-explanatory. So I read through the description in detail before I bought it and after I got the band on 18th July, I also spoke to the support team at GOQii and got my band easily activated. One of the interesting features is that unlike my previous 2 cores where it would start with a 'TAP', Vital you need to swipe from the plus sign downwards. I found the touch and swipe feature convenient as against a tap.
I have used mi band 2 for 1 and half year .... Bluetooth connectivity is far better than this band .... Not able to get my phone notification

I have been huawei's honor band 3 user for a long time. This is my second fitness band. I really like this band but there is one thing which is really annoying and needs improvement. This one thing is raise to wakeup feature. It's really slow. It takes 1-2 second to wakeup the screen after raising the wrist completely. Most of the times it doesn't even work. It can be easily fixed via a software patch.

Activation never worked. Tried various mobiles One plus, MI etc. Customer service is not easily reachable. I couldn't use it till now. Without successful activation or registration you cannot sync phone and watch

I am writing the review after buying it in original launch and patiently waiting for almost 45 days. First of all, the blood pressure measurement feature is nothing but a gimmick! They are selling it with headlining it as a BP monitor on the wrist where all it does is just randomly give any pre defined/programmed reading on it's own.

I bought it for my wife and when opened it's not ready to turn on. Tried to charge from all types of charger but in vain hence applied for replacement. To my surprise the new replacement device also turns out to be defective hence I applied straight for refund. Who wants to take risk by wearing such risky tracker that can stop workin at anytime. If their new devices are giving such issues m sure it won't last a year even if it works at start.

I am not sure if this product is tested before its launch. I have used 2 vital trackers still there was error in steps counting and second tracker had battery issues in addition. Also some of the fuctions like date format and sleep monitoring was not properly working. Atleast step counts should be accurate, while sitting in car this tracker would count 500-700 steps without any movement at all. I dont know if heart rate or BP monitering is accurate or not as simple step counting was not even correct.
Support team sucks
Got it for mybhubby. He has been using for one +month. Onky problem is call alerts are

I bought GOQii for its unique feature, i.e., BP measurement on the go. Its definitely a cool gadget. It tracks your foot steps, exercise details, heart rate as well. Its app logs all your measurements.

it doesnt track anything unless you check that specific option...i.e. if you run without checking the run option then the stupid band does not even show an increased heart rate (that is incredibly stupid).....same for every activity...and oh...on top of it if you make a complaint they dont even bother responding.

Giving 5 stars based on delivery by amazon and looks + connectivity of the watch.will review again after a month for battery life.also some reviews mentioned bp is not accurate...it will never be..it can only give an idea and for step count it is damn accurate.. a fair deal in INR 1800
Excellent device
It's latest one and cheap for me  with coach of 3 month
The Tracker does not link with several mobile phones. They say the tracker requires low energy blue tooth connection and hence the issue. In my case, it has become a useless piece of junk.

Very worst device. Instructions on manul not clear, GOQii Appa is only for marketing of products. There is no any guidelines for use of app. Money waste device, please dont think to buy it. Device is not connecting to GOQii app.
It's not charging at all I have tried  different USB ports with no result I am returning it
Blood pressure monitor at it wrist . Amazed with the unique technology. No longer have to rely on bp machines n docs.
The app is good and we get motivation but the product not good I faced so many issues on first day.. suddenly Bluetooth automatically cut I am again connected it..
I am fully satisfied from GoQii. A perfect friend 24*7
This is first review in Amazon for a fitness band, Am not a fitness freak but due to guqqi I always start tracking my records I don't know why( previously I use mi band 2).
Worst product  to spend the money.. Never buy.. Amazon should also think why they sell such faulty and useless products

I am writing this review after using the Goqii band and their services for the last 18 months. I started with their earlier version of tracker and now upgraded to this latest version VITAL which is having colour display, Bllod pressure measurement and tracking your various activities like running, workouts and cycling. My experience with Goqii is one of a very positive change in my life not only a weight reduction of 20 kg in 18 months but also a very active and healthy life, Eventhough we may have the determination to lead a healthy way of life without any external inducement, a little push towards the right direction will go long way in attaining our goal in a safe and faster pace. Goqii is one such push with its relentless coaching and guidance and doctor consultation and numerous video guides. The latest addition of interactive video guides through the app is a delight to watch where you can clarify your doubts then and there with expert fitness coaches, nutritionists and doctors. If you are interested in leading a healthy life you need proper guidance and Goqii is one such service and an excellent one and there is no parallel . GO FOR IT without any hesitation, you will be certainly happy with your decision.
BP measuring is not working. Battery lasts for just 2 days and not 7 days as promised. Footsteps and HR shows correct figure.
Works well . Love it
Not giving notification of apps useless band

Got carried away by newspaper articles about the product, particularly the blood pressure monitor and exaggerated reviews. Purchased at ‚Çπ 2999/- in lightning deal. Used for 5 days. Very dissatisfying experience. Initially there was lot of difficulty in connecting the band with Goqii app. Battery life is poor, doesn‚Äôt last beyond  2 days. Steps counts keep on shooting even for small activity. Blood pressure monitor is an amazing technology but it is not accurate & cannot be depended upon particularly by BP patients who want to monitor regularly. Band keeps on getting auto-disconnected from Goqii app on iphone & needs to be re-connected by switching ‚Äòoff & on‚Äô bluetooth multiple times a day. Charging requires taking off the band straps and then connecting to USB charger & is very inconvenient. Colour display is good. Messages/calls are indicated on band.
Nice and sleek design. A must have option for every fitness freak. Goqii helps us to motivate and achieve our goals. Goqii has very good and well trained trainers and fitness expert.

The GOQii Vital is a brilliant device..the accuracy and the ease with which my parents are able to use the device and also check thier BP is very good.. My 67 year only mother is also able to use the goqii app and coach feature and very delighted with the result...

This a great ecosystem: coach+band, the GOQii coach are amazing they really keep tap, motivates with periodic calls and messages. The step counter on the band is accurate. And the Goqii play is really an amazing add on, where daily there is live session with goqii coaches regarding various fitness & health related topics.

The main USP of this product is the Community and Subscription for Coach, Experts & Doctor. I have used multiple Health Trackers (Mi Band 2, Samsung Gear Fit2, etc.) but no one was able to provide me such insight on my Lifestyle, Healthy Habits, etc.
Though the colour display of the watch looks very attractive, it is the only good part with this fitness tracker!!!

I recently upgraded to v3 of this Goqii Tracker which is named as Goqii Vital, earlier I was using v2 of Goqii Tracker and this one is way ahead in every aspect whether its technology, ease of use, functionality, display, features I mean everything and above all I never found a tracker which would display Blood Pressure (BP) which sets this tracker class apart. When combined / Sync with Goqii App I get to see all my HR graph of all the activities I've been doing which is of great help to see how my heart was performing.

My brother gifted me this on Rakhi. This is the best gift anyone could ever ask for. I always wanted to opt for a healthy lifestyle but owing to other priorities I sided this. But as he presented me with this expensive byt valuable present, since then my health has also become a priority for me. I have opted for a healthy food habit as well as exercise. Whenever I feel like binge eating, the watch reminds me as if alerting me. So that's a good one! ;)
Goquii is the best way for one to be healthy, fit, and active. The goquii platform provides access to pleathora of means by which one is constantly aware of her/his health. The ones I liked most are:

There are several brands offering fitness band with different prices and features. But, at very reasonable price GOQii offer similar stuff. The personal fitness coach available for chat at any time of the day makes the product standout from others. Their encouragement and inspiration helps you to push your boundaries and achieve the fitness goals. The app also provide several videos and articles on physical and mental fitness which are really useful.  Live session with several fitness coaches is superb. This product has made a difference in my quality of life. Thanks GOQii Team for terrific job.

I got the defective item. The box was already opened. The step count is way off. It counted 2600 steps while I was sleeping. Sleep monitoring is also not accurate. Battery lasts long only if you don't use HR BP monitoring.

Let me start with the band, please bear in mind that the band doesn't do anything without the subscription, so if you are planning to use it just as a band, there are better and cheaper options available... Coming to the subscription, 3 months comes free after that you'll have to spend money to get additional subscription . Goqii has built an amazing ecosystem with Coaches, Doctors and Experts and has the potential to be a great product but it still isn't there. At this point I have just been taking help from the Coach that they provide, it is just a high level guidance about how to make small changes in your life in terms of habits, while I think it is a good idea but I would not want to pay for such common sense guidance that I l already know. I was expecting things like a detail diet plan etc but that is one me, should have done my research better.

I am writing this review after using this app and associated services for more than 2 & 1/2 years. From being a basic pedometer, goqii tracker has added sleep, heart rate, blood pressure over a period of time. This review is not just about the app; but the overall services. Key advantages of Goqii are

The device is a faulty one and shows incorrect steps, and it having lots of bugs. Call notification doesn't work, many times their app crashes, many times it doesn't record sleep timings properly. I started repenting my decision to buy this device within 2-3 days. You can use this product like a watch.

Quality of the tracker is okay. I can see space on the side from where water or sweat can easily enter. The product has a coloured display which is good. It also has bp monitor that is good enough not perfect. Step count is accurate. But the band has sync issues and the app is not good at all. All they are trying to do is sell you stuff on the app which is not why anyone  buys the band. The coaching feature is unique might even help some people but it is not for everyone. I suggest go for another brand with good app support and quality tracker.
